articles.title: Priyanka Chopra dons a cream dress as she departs Paris Fashion Week event with husband Nick Jonas - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 40, cut a chic figure in a cream midi dress which she layered above a khaki coat while toting her essentials around in a mustard handbag.
articles.content:
Nick Jonas and his wife Priyanka Chopra looked trendy as they departed a swanky event during Paris Fashion Week on Saturday night.
